comments.body: @bluehood Should one put here error message or assert or it is very improbable situation?

I think it's fine to leave things like this, these widths are then passed to `std::setw`, and in case they are shorter than the column name (in case someone has a dataframe column with a name more than 65000 characters long...) the printing will just be uglier -- still better than erroring out (and anyway, the printing will already be screwed up unless your screen is more than 65k columns wide)
